thumb.title: 【ARC】MORTAL KOMBAT - SUB ZERO
thumb.description: 真人快打モータルコンバットMortal Kombat T-Unit Rev.5.0.0(1992, MIDWAY)Character - Sub-Zero難易度・★★★★★☆☆☆ (Lvl.5, Hardest)Non-Tool Assisted Run1 Coin Credit, No Matches Lost==="The actual name or identity of this warrior is unknown. However, based on the markings of his uniform, it is believed he belongs to the Lin Kuei, a legendary clan of Chinese ninja." 「この戦士の実際の名前や身元は不明です。しかし、制服の模様から判断すると、彼は伝説的な中国の忍者一族であるリン・クエイに属していると思われます。」「呢位戰士嘅實際名或者身份係未知嘅，但係根據佢嘅制服嘅標記，相信佢係屬於中國忍者嘅一個傳奇氏族林奎。」===00:00 Arcade Attract Intro00:07 Character Select (Sub-Zero)00:15 Liu Kang00:58 Sonya Blade01:40 Scorpion (Hanzo Hasashi)02:20 Test Your Might - Wood02:28 Raiden03:03 Kano03:45 Johnny Cage04:27 Test Your Might - Stone04:35 Sub-Zero (Mirror Match)05:16 Endurance I (Kano, Raiden)06:20 Endurance II (Cage, Sonya)07:26 Test Your Might - Steel07:35 Endurance III (Raiden, Cage)08:42 Goro09:25 Shang Tsung (Final Stage)10:18 Ending & Credits12:36 Thanks For Watching!======ご視聴感謝するThanks For Watching!
